interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 24 Pieces Hair Curlers Spiral Curls Styling Kit, No Heat Hair Rollers Spiral Styling Curlers Heatless Wave Style Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Long Hair Styling Tools (11.8 Inches)
Review Date: 2020/09/17
Store: WILLBOND
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Size': '11.8 Inch (Pack of 24)', 'Brand': 'WILLBOND', 'Color': 'Yellow', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 9.13 x 2.95 inches; 7.05 Ounces'}
Review Text: I wasn’t real impressed with these hair curlers. The hook kept breaking and it felt like I was ripping my hair out trying to pull them through the tube. I started with wet hair and I even put a curl enhancer in before starting the tubes. I let them air dry and put a hair dryer on them before I took them out. But I ended up with a frizzy mess that did have some definition but not enough to even want to attempt all that pain again
Review Title: Tiny little torcher devices
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beard Balm Leave In Conditioner - All Natural Beard Oil Wax for Beard Mustache & Hair Growth, Deep Beard Softener Cream Butter, Soothes Softens Tames & Styles Hair, Beard Care Kit Best Gift for Men Premium Nature {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.9 x 2.8 x 1.1 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Beard Balm', 'UPC': '857646006664'} When you start getting a decent beard you realize the value of beard balms and oils. After you shampoo your beard you basically strip it of oils and dirt. That is good but you have to replace the oils if you don't want the dreaded beard itch and dandruff. This stuff does a great job at replacing the striped oils. It keeps my beard happy and that helps keep me happy. I also enjoy the sent of this balm. It is a mild sent of citrus orange in my opinion. I have used others with less sent and some that are much stronger. This sent seems to leave about an hour after applying.

Pros:
Natural ingredients
Good conditioning
Easy to use tin.
Easy to apply consistency

Cons:
If I use it multiple times in day I started to get zits in certain areas.

All in all. It is a good product and keeps my beard looking and feeling good. Great conditioner. Keep your beard happy. Argan Oil Hair Treatment Gift Set - 3 Value Pack: Morrocan Argan Oil Shampoo 8oz Conditioner 8 oz & Hair Heat Protectant Spray 4oz Sulfate Free Natural Damaged Hair Growth Repair Packaging May Vary Premium Nature {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 7.05 x 2.28 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'Argan Oil Hair Care Set', 'UPC': '857646006497'} I was hesitant to try this because my hair is colored and very finicky. But I only have a few complaints. One con for me is these smell good (kinda like a unisex smell) but it's so strong that I almost got annoyed by it. Although I was amazed at how long the smell lasted after the initial wash. Another con for me is the conditioner is very thin substance. I have long hair and because of the consistency it takes a lot more conditioner than I was hoping. It did not fade my color which is a plus!! And I have to brag about how much I love the heat spray. It doesn't leave my hair looking greasy or a weird sticky texture after straightening my hair. I will be buying the heat spray again!! Overall great product just be aware of the scent. It smells good just very strong and if you aren't into unisex scent it will almost smells like cologne. Great product strong scent Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Beard Care Gift Sets Best Mustache and Beard Growth Natural Beard Oil Beard Softener Conditioner Balm Butter And Wooden Comb Best Gift Idea for Men Premium Nature Premium Nature {'Hair Type': 'Coarse', 'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 4.02 x 2.36 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '857646006961'} Alright, I have tried many different beard oils and typically I am unsatisfied with the smell in some sort of way. Most of them seem to have the smell of an old lady. Many are so strong they give me headaches as the sent rests under me nose all day.
None of this is the case with this beard oil. It has an amazing smell and the sent strength is just perfect. It has citrus woodsy type smell in my opinion. It gained the approval of my wife in the smells department and that is no easy feat. Plus it conditions and hydrates just as it should. It will keep your beardruff at bay.

I would most definitely recommend to a friend! I finally found the one. Blackhead Remover Peel Off Mask - Black Charcoal Face Mask Deep Detox Cleanser for Blackheads Pore Minimizer Facial Black Head Masks, Reduce Pores Pimple & Acne Absorbs Dirt & Oil Brighten & Purify Premium Nature {'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.12 x 1.65 x 1.34 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Blackehead Remover Mask', 'UPC': '857646006619'} I was quite amazed with this mask. It's not painful to remove and I actually saw results after first use! I will definitely be back for more Amazing URBEST Hair Coils, Tie Hair, Spiral Hair Ties,Phone Cord Hair Ties, Elastics Hair Tie, No Crease Hair Ties, Coil Ponytail Holder (Grey) URBEST {'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'URBEST', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.6 x 0.75 inches; 1.59 Ounces'} These spiral hair ties work nicely. I bought the small’s and they work for my daughters thick hair as well as my hair which is not as thick. I like them for many reasons: they have stretch but not too much and if they lose their stretchiness they’re easily fixed back to almost new with a little heat, they don’t pull my hair leaving me with a headache and they don’t leave the nasty ponytail crease in my hair. Hello new hair ties Wax warmer {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 7.87 x 5.9 inches; 2.27 Pounds'} I’m a bit of a waxing newb. However for the price I just had to try. This waxing kit is pretty self explanatory and easy to use. It works great as well. I will say that it took about 15 minutes longer than the directions said to fully heat up. However I’m pretty impressed with the results. It doesn’t take up a ton of space either. Wax on wax off Daniel son 2 Pieces Jade Stone Eyelash Extensions Round Jade Stone Adhesive Glue Lashes Pallet with 2 Pieces Straight and Curved Tip Tweezers Nipper for False Lash Application Tools (Green) Mudder {'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Material': 'stainless steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.33 x 1.18 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Stone Adhesive', 'Item Form': 'Individual, Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 1.18 x 0.63 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Great for lash extensions and easy to use. Nice 48 Pieces Satin Hair Scrunchies Soft Silk Elastic Hair Bands Floral Solid Hair Ties Ropes Ponytail Holder Rubber Headband for Women Girls Hair Accessories Syhood {'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Syhood', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '48', 'Package Dimensions': '10.25 x 8.5 x 0.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Between myself and my daughter, we go through a lot of scrunchies. I really like the skinny scrunchies as they work better for my hair. But they’re hard to come by. This pack has a variety of designs, Colts, and material. The quality isn’t the best as a few of them seem like they’re pulling apart before ever getting used but the way we go through them it won’t be a deal breaker. actual_interaction.text: I wasn’t real impressed with these hair curlers. The hook kept breaking and it felt like I was ripping my hair out trying to pull them through the tube. I started with wet hair and I even put a curl enhancer in before starting the tubes. I let them air dry and put a hair dryer on them before I took them out. But I ended up with a frizzy mess that did have some definition but not enough to even want to attempt all that pain again
